Axe Mastery.desc: +{dmg}% weapon damage and increased critical strike chance with axes

Beast Mastery.desc: +{dmg}% pet damage, +{crit}% (est.) pet critical strike chance, skills disabled {dis} sec after pet death

Divine Favor.desc: allies healed for {heal} when you cast Monk spells on them

Expertise.desc: -{cost}% energy cost for Ranger skills, attack skills, rituals, and touch skills

Fast Casting.desc: -{time}% casting time of spells/signets, -{re}% recharge time of Mesmer spells (PvE)

Hammer Mastery.desc: +{dmg}% weapon damage and increased critical strike chance with hammers

Leadership.desc: 1 energy for each ally affected by shouts/chants, max {max}

Marksmanship.desc: +{dmg}% weapon damage and increased critical strike chance with bows

Mysticism.desc: -{cost}% cost of Dervish enchantments, +{def} armor while enchanted (PvE)

Scythe Mastery.desc: +{dmg}% weapon damage and increased critical strike chance with scythes

Soul Reaping.desc: {en} energy when a non-spirit creature near you dies, max {max15} every 15 sec

Spawning Power.desc: +{inc}% summoned creature health, +{inc}% weapon spell duration

Spear Mastery.desc: +{dmg}% weapon damage and increased critical strike chance with spears

Strength.desc: {ap}% armor penetration to attack skills with lower penetration

Swordsmanship.desc: +{dmg}% weapon damage and increased critical strike chance with swords
